thread.title: 10 reasons 'This Is Us' has emerged as a hit for NBC
thread.title_full: 10 reasons 'This Is Us' has emerged as a hit for NBC

author: Mark Dawidziak, The Plain Dealer
title: 10 reasons 'This Is Us' has emerged as a hit for NBC
text: As if "This is Us" fans didn't have enough to cry about, their beloved show is airing its season finale at 9 p.m. Tuesday, March 14. But there's every good reason for devoted viewers to smile through their tears.
